授業目的: Research Seminar will improve students' abilities to conduct research and analyses on themes of their own choices.
到達目標: Through group and individual guidance and consultation with the faculty, the students will carry out research/analyses on their interested research theme. The first part of Research Seminar (Spring) will broadly cover selected accounting and business issues from cases, newspaper and journal articles. The second part of Research Seminar (Fall) will continue on topics covered in Spring with more detailed analyses and discussions of each student's individual research theme.
